Description: Used by the kube-apiserver to recognize clients using mTLS.

Items.Description: CA for kube-apiserver to recognize the kube-controller-manager and kube-scheduler client certificates.

Items.Description: CA for kube-apiserver to recognize all known certificate based clients.
